name: Puppy vs. Pumpkins
description:
Story:

Magret and her dog Blackie lost their way in an enchanted garden of evil pumpkins.

Controls:

Magret is moved with the cursor keys, the dog moves exactly opposite. You might have to click on the game screen to make the key inputs work. Blackie must avoid pumkins at all cost. Magret can destroy plants by jumping on them (via Space key).

Credits:

This game was made in Scratch. Scratch is a project of the Lifelong Kindergarten Group at the MIT Media Lab

Music "Wet Puppy" by fri.events Orchestra under Creative Commons
Haunted house image is public domain
The romal numbers of Blackie's name are converted based on Fibonacci112358's roman numeral converter: http://scratch.mit.edu/projects/1758561/
Puppy graphics and animation by lauraisawesome, check out her project Billy's Adoption Center at Scratch: http://scratch.mit.edu/projects/11945272/
